item.description:
Each day we make decisions & choices but have we made the right choice? How do I know if I am on the right Path? How much do I trust my intuition?
The Pendulum is one way of using our own energy to tap into our own intuitive power.
This workshop will help you to use the tools we all have to make the right choice.
We will discuss The Nature of Intuition and learn how to use the pendulum and several other methods which help us to tap into our higher wiser self.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the back closed off room.

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Your Intuitve Powers - Using a Pendulum and other Tools
